quest.name: Making Scents
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol has a nose for perfumes.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid amber at Mjrl's RegretDeliver the splendid amber to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid lavender at Mjrl's RegretDeliver the splendid lavender to Qhoterl PasolSpearfish a splendid pirarucu in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid pirarucu to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: You're doubtless aware, MistressMaster Forename, that we Qitari possess eminently keen noses. Even in pitch-black darkness, we can discern one of our own from another and locate them.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: However, the caverns we explore can be filled with strange gases that confuse our sense of smell. To cut through this haze, we've taken to using a special perfume, which I would concoct with your assistance.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: At Mjrl's Regret, it is possible to find amber─a key ingredient in the perfume. Will you not mine three pieces for me?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: At Mjrl's Regret, it is possible to find lavender─a key ingredient in the perfume. Will you not gather three sprigs for me?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: In the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta dwells a fish called the pirarucu─a key ingredient in the perfume. Will you not catch one for me?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: That will suffice to make a goodly batch of the stuff to help keep us safe during our explorations. Much obliged, good madamsir!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: It is possible to find amber at Mjrl's Regret. I'd be much obliged if you could obtain three pieces for me.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: It is possible to find lavender at Mjrl's Regret. I'd be much obliged if you could obtain three sprigs for me.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: It is possible to find pirarucu in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. I'd be much obliged if you could catch one for me.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: <sniff> <sniff> You've returned with what I seek, and no mistake. Now, if I might examine it...

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: My, such a potent smell! This will serve most splendidly, oh yes!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: With a spot of refining, it will make a scent that is unmistakable in the caverns. Hehe, 'tis time once again to put my skills as a perfumer to use!
